story: Ahmed Magdy shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Why code review beats testing: evidence from decades of programming research | Kevin Burke
caption: kev.inburke.com
description: tl;dr If you want to ship high quality code, you should invest in more than one of formal code review, design inspection, testing, and quality assurance. Testing catches fewer bugs per hour than human inspection of code, but it might be catching different types of bugs.
